Name: Margarita
Description: One margarita, two margarita, three margarita, floor!

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una margarita, dos margarita, tres margarita, ¡al piso!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 마르가리타 한잔, 마르가리타 두잔, 마르가리타 세잔, 바닥!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine Margarita, zwei Margarita, drei Margarita, Boden!
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un margarita, deux margaritas, trois margaritas, plancher!
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma margarida, duas margaritas, três margaridas, chão!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Одна маргарита, две маргариты, три маргариты, пол!
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Bir margarita, iki margarita, üç margarita, kat!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 玛格丽特。一杯玛格丽塔，两杯玛格丽塔，三杯玛格丽特，倒！
